text: Hi, I just found an odd error `access to undefined reference` . It occurred when my GPU memory overflow and after that,  even I reclaim enough memory, the error would still appeared when I tried any GPU-related commands such as very simple `CUDA.memory_status()`   . I was wondering how to fix it.

elements.text: Hi, I just found an odd error
. It occurred when my GPU memory overflow and after that,  even I reclaim enough memory, the error would still appeared when I tried any GPU-related commands such as very simple
. I was wondering how to fix it.

text: Can you provide the full stacktrace?

elements.text: Can you provide the full stacktrace?

text: Hi Julian. Sorry for my late reply. After updating the CUDA.jl, the error information turn to a more detailed memory shortage and I think that kind of solve my own issues. Many thanks.
